metadata.title: CVE-2019-18928 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Cyrus IMAP 2.5.x before 2.5.14 and 3.x before 3.0.12 allows privilege escalation because an HTTP request may be interpreted in the authentication context of an unrelated previous request that arrived over the same connection.

criterions.comment: cyrus-imapd package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.0.12-1').
